TextView.android:text: The road to success is always under construction. Concrete is a civil engineer’s best friend. In this event the participants will be tested on their common sense and basic civil engineering knowledge especially regarding cement concrete.

Round 1-PUZZLE-A-MANIA
RULES AND REGULATIONS: A slideshow will be shown asking :- · In first slide, there will be some questions related to different branches of engineering. · In the second slide, a crossword will be given to check the Civil Engg. Aptitude.

Round 2-NIRMAAN ·
Firstly, make a mould of specified dimensions with cardboard and tape. · The designed reinforcement then needs to be designed and fixed in the mould following which the concrete (design mix) is poured into the moulds. · The model of bridge kept for curing for a time period of one day. · The model after curing will be tested under loads on next day. · The dimension of the mould are:- Ø Clear span of bridge-40 Ø Minimum height of arch from base-12 Ø Height of bridge-18 Ø Width of supports-5 Ø Thickness of support/bridge-10 NOTE: All dimensions in cm.
